alert.note: Alert for Moses Lake Area; Upper Columbia Basin (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 05 at 2:24PM PST until January 06 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 4 and 7 inches. * WHERE...Grand Coulee, Coulee City, Quincy, Wilbur, Ephrata, Ritzville, Harrington, Othello, Odessa, Moses Lake, and Creston. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...The Thursday morning commute will be significantly impacted by this storm. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas of freezing rain will be possible Thursday afternoon and evening before temperature climb above freezing overnight Thursday. Portions of Interstate 90 around Moses Lake may receive a light glaze of ice. Parts of US 395 between Ritzville and Tri Cities may also receive freezing rain Thursday afternoon and evening.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Moses Lake Area; Upper Columbia Basin
